resources.string: Application will try to establish VPN connection right after configuration applied
Allow user to disconnect VPN connection
Allow import profile from .ovpn file. When this option is enabled managed configuration is ignored.
Name of VPN profile. This field is required
Type of authentication that will be used to establish vpn connection
When checked LZO compression will be used
Content of CA certificate in Base64 format
Content of Client certificate in Base64 format
Content of Client key in Base64 format
Content of PKCS12 in Base64 format
Username that will be used when authentication type requires Username and Password
Password that will be used when authentication type requires Username and Password
Protocol that will be used in connection.
Proxy server address is required only when Proxy is set to HTTP or Socksv5
Proxy server port is required only when Proxy is set to HTTP or Socksv5
Can be set only when HTTP Proxy is set. When set proxy username and password will be required
Proxy username used only when Proxy Authentication is set in HTTP Proxy
Proxy username used only when Proxy Authentication is set in HTTP Proxy
When set Requests IP addresses, routes and timing options will be pulled from server. In other way Settings need to be specified
Used when pull option is not set. Provide IPv4 Address/Netmask in CIDR Format (e.q. 1.2.3.4/24)
Used when pull option is not set. Provide IPv6 Address/Netmask in CIDR Format (e.q. 2000:dd::23/64)
Do not bind to local address and port
Override DNS settings provided by server
Search domain, will be used only when override DNS settings is set
DNS Server address, will be used only when override DNS settings is set
Alternative DNS server, will be used only when override DNS settings is set
Networks directly connected to the local interfaces will not be routed over the VPN. Deselecting this option will redirect all traffic intended for local networks to VPN
Block IPv6 (or IPv4) if not set
This option instructs Android to not allow protocols (IPv4/IPv6) if the VPN does not set any IPv4 or IPv6 addresses
Redirects all Traffic over the VPN for IPv4
Used only when Redirect all Traffic over the VPN is not set. Provide only destination in CIDR format. "10.0.0.0/8" would redirect 10.0.0.0/8 over the VPN
Used only when Redirect all Traffic over the VPN is not set. Specify Routes that should NOT be routed over the VPN. Use the same syntax as for included routes
Redirects all Traffic over the VPN for IPv6
Used only when Redirect all Traffic over the VPN is not set. Provide only destination in CIDR format. "10.0.0.0/8" would redirect 10.0.0.0/8 over the VPN
Used only when Redirect all Traffic over the VPN is not set. Specify Routes that should NOT be routed over the VPN. Use the same syntax as for included routes
Checks whether the server uses a certificate with TLS Server extensions (—remote-cert-tls server)
Checks the Remote Server Certificate Subject DN
Used only when Certificate Hostname Check is set. Certificate verification type. For more details see the OpenVPN 2.3.1+ manpage under —verify-x509-name
Used only when Certificate Hostname Check is set. Remote certificate subject
Used only when Certificate Hostname Check is set. Field in the X.509 certificate subject to be used as the username (default=CN)
Used only when TLS Authentication is enabled. Provide content of TLS Certificate in Base64 format
Enter the encryption cipher algorithm used by OpenVPN. Leave empty to use default cipher
Enter the authentication digest used for OpenVPN. Leave empty to use default digest
Do not fallback to no VPN connection when OpenVPN is reconnecting
Send extra information to the server, e.g. SSL version and Android version
Adds 6 random chars in front of hostname
Allows authenticated packets from any IP
Enter custom OpenVPN options. Use with caution. Also not that many of the tun related OpenVPN settings cannot be supported by design of the VPNSettings
Number of seconds to wait between connection attempts. Default 2s
Enter the maximum time between connection attempts. OpenVPN will slowly raise its waiting time after an unsuccessful connection attempt up to this value. Default 300s
Specify that all applications on device should use VPN

List of applications. When Use VPN for all applications is set then applications on this list will excluded from VPN. When Use VPN for all applications is not set then only applications on this list will use VPN. To add list of applications split them with ";" symbol.
No configuration received from the EMM agent

Max time to keep logs (in days)
Profile importing is disabled by managed configuration
